Blackfang waited as the pod seemed to take its time loading.
Seemingly, it was an ancient processor.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator"
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> OOC: If I make any mistakes in this post, I'm sorry, but I'm just
very confused right now and think I missed a reply somewhere.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> The two pods cracked open. The one that was brought back to the
Predacon base is focused on. A set of legs came out of the side.
Arachnid legs. A set of arachnid legs then came out of the other side.
A long tail rose, and then two claws emerged. The giant scorpion
pulled itself from the pod and stood on the edges. It was gray with
orange claws.
> 
> Sandstorm: Greetings, my name is Sandstorm. Identify yourself...
